issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
In Jenkins report of YARN-6313 (https://builds.apache.org/job/PreCommit-YARN-Build/15260/artifact/patchprocess/patch-compile-hadoop-yarn-project_hadoop-yarn.txt), we found following build failure due to YARN new UI:
{noformat}
/testptch/hadoop/hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-ui/target/src/main/webapp/node_modules/ember-cli-htmlbars/node_modules/broccoli-persistent-filter/node_modules/async-disk-cache/node_modules/username/index.js:2
const os = require('os');
^^^^^
Use of const in strict mode.
SyntaxError: Use of const in strict mode.
    at Module._compile (module.js:439:25)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (module.js:474:10)
    at Module.load (module.js:356:32)
    at Function.Module._load (module.js:312:12)
    at Module.require (module.js:364:17)
    at require (module.js:380:17)
    at Object.<anonymous> (/testptch/hadoop/hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-ui/target/src/main/webapp/node_modules/ember-cli-htmlbars/node_modules/broccoli-persistent-filter/node_modules/async-disk-cache/index.js:24:16)
    at Module._compile (module.js:456:26)
    at Object.Module._extensions..js (module.js:474:10)
    at Module.load (module.js:356:32)
DEPRECATION: Node v0.10.25 is no longer supported by Ember CLI. Please update to a more recent version of Node
undefined
version: 1.13.15
Could not find watchman, falling back to NodeWatcher for file system events.
Visit http://www.ember-cli.com/user-guide/#watchman for more info.
Building[INFO] ------------------------------------------------------------------------
{noformat}
fields.summary: Jenkins report YARN new UI build failure

comments.body: cc [~leftnoteasy], [~sunilg].
Also spotted in YARN-6326.
Will look into the issue.
Also HDFS-6984
I ll analyze and update fix ASAP.

It seems an underlying dependency change happened in ember and yarn-ui was using a deprecated ember version.
Now this patch ensures that we use latest patch for node,npm and ember.

Update patch to pick correct dist folder for preparing war package as well.

This message was automatically generated.

Reproduced the issue locally and verified after applying patch .. 
Committed to trunk.. thanks [~sunilg] for the patch and [~akhilpb] for the review.

SUCCESS: Integrated in Jenkins build Hadoop-trunk-Commit #11408 (See [https://builds.apache.org/job/Hadoop-trunk-Commit/11408/])
YARN-6336. Jenkins report YARN new UI build failure. Contributed by (rohithsharmaks: rev bb6a214cd34b9c87b0ba68205c680024ad294587)
* (edit) hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-ui/pom.xml
* (edit) hadoop-yarn-project/hadoop-yarn/hadoop-yarn-ui/src/main/webapp/package.json
Hi [~rohithsharma] and [~sunilg], from Jenkins report above, even with this patch, it still report build failure with YARN UI. Does our fix here solve the issue?
Compile failed without patch which is expected. After patch compile success which is green in the above Jenkin report.
Do you mean above compile failed is without the patch? If so, that's really confusing as no where to hint this. Also, overall "-1" doesn't make sense...

IIUC, In the Jenkins report, there are 2 level of reports are there. 
# Without patch : Verify for compilation, site, eclipse:eclipse and javadoc. {color:red} -1	compile	2m 46s	hadoop-yarn-ui in trunk failed.{color} The red color indication trunk compilation failed without patch. 
# With patch : for above verification. There is {color:green} +1	compile	3m 33s	the patch passed{color} this indicates after patch compilation is success. 

One thing I observed now is the link of compile report is going for trunk report. This is something wrong which need to be fixed!!
Any committer helps to retrigger YARN-6326 Hadoop-QA Jenkins. That could also test if the problem is still there.

bq. One thing I observed now is the link of compile report is going for trunk report. This is something wrong which need to be fixed!!
Agree. Will file a Yetus JIRA to track this.
Filed YETUS-495.

bq. Any committer helps to retrigger YARN-6326 Hadoop-QA Jenkins. That could also test if the problem is still there.
No. the patch won't be applied any more given patch already get committed. I believe [~rohithsharma]'s comment is correct. Just Jenkins report is confusing - we already file JIRA for improvement.
[~djp], I mean YARN-6326, not this JIRA.
I believe someone triggered already. Anyway, I think issue is fixed by the patch. Sorry for the noise as misreading Jenkins report.
Thanks [~djp]. BTW, It passed in YARN-6326.
